title: D.I.Y. Sci-Fi: A Talk With Justin Benson and Aaron Moorhead
description: The filmmaking and acting team discuss their latest low-budget science fiction movie, “Something in the Dirt,” and their work on the Marvel Disney+ series “Moon Knight.”
dc:creator: Andrew Crump
media:credit: Michael Tyrone Delaney for The New York Times
media:description: Justin Benson, left, and Aaron Moorhead at Benson’s apartment complex in Los Angeles. This door was a prop in their film.
